skills.skill: Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing, or related field

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the productization of small business financial inclusion initiatives and develop go-to-market and commercialization strategies.
Work cross-functionally with various teams on end-to-end product development and conduct competitive analyses.
Develop and execute the Studio processes, gap analyses, and opportunity assessments for new concepts and products.
Build customer pitches, define value propositions, and participate in client meetings as required.
Plan and track products’ and programs’ performance against targets and provide subject matter expertise on matters pertaining to financial inclusion for small businesses.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing, or a related field
